items.sentence: Tom told Mary that he was planning to do that.

There are many other things we could be doing.
Please see to it that the dog doesn\'t go out.
Tom would just like to know what he did wrong.
Tom wrote an article for the school newspaper.
I hope Tom doesn\'t have to work this weekend.
I hope Tom hasn\'t already drunk all the milk.
I hope you and Tom won\'t be too disappointed.
I hope you\'ll have a lot of fun on your trip.
